mapper.insert:
insert into dows_uim.oauth_scope(client_id, scope, descr, status, deleted, dt) values
(#{entity.clientId}, #{entity.scope}, #{entity.descr}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.dt})

insert into dows_uim.oauth_scope(client_id, scope, descr, status, deleted, dt) values
(#{entity.clientId}, #{entity.scope}, #{entity.descr}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.dt})
on duplicate key update client_id = values(client_id) , scope = values(scope) , descr = values(descr) , status = values(status) , deleted = values(deleted) , dt = values(dt)
